greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-2) + a(n-3) with a(0)=2, a(1)=1, a(2)=2.
comment: With offset of 5 this sequence is the 4th row of the tribonacci array A136175.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000 (terms 0..200 from Robert Price)
Martin Burtscher, Igor Szczyrba, Rafał Szczyrba, Analytic Representations of the n-anacci Constants and Generalizations Thereof, Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 18 (2015), Article 15.4.5.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,1).
results.author: _Abel Amene_, Jul 29 2012
